helloStart.text: My name is Liz D Wil.
Are you having a good day today?

random.text: I'm not sure I got that, are you having an oh-kay day?
Were you able to hear my question clearly?
Are you able to repeat that again?
You may need to talk louder or more clearly

helpOfferStart.text: So how may I help you, today?

random.text: That's wonderful, I'm doing great myself today.
Nice! I'm enjoying the weather here.
Awwwww, well maybe Chris or I will be able to help.
Gotch yuh, I'll try to get you where you need A S A P.

helpOfferConfused.text: I'm not sure I understand what you're communicating
But hey I can transfer calls and leave messages for Chris
